# ProductSpotlightCard A versatile product spotlight card component that showcases products with images, titles, and descriptions. ## Basic Usage ## Props Name Type Default Description `imageAlt` `string` - Alt text for the product image `title` `string` - Product title `description` `string` - Product description `href` `string` - Optional link URL for the product. When not provided, the card will be non-interactive without cursor pointer. `className` `string` - Additional CSS classes `sizes` `string` `"(max-width: 768px) 100vw, (max-width: 1200px) 50vw, 192px"` Image sizes attribute for responsive loading
## Usage ```tsx import ProductSpotlightCard from "@/components/ui/product-spotlight-card" export default function ProductSpotlightCardDemo() { return (
{/* Interactive card with href */} {/* Static card without href */}
) } ``` ## Features - **Responsive Design**: Automatically adjusts to different screen sizes - **Hover Effects**: Smooth transitions and visual feedback on hover (only when href is provided) - **Accessibility**: Proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation - **Image Optimization**: Built-in Next.js Image component for optimal loading - **Customizable**: Supports custom styling through className prop - **Flexible Layout**: Works with or without title and description - **Interactive States**: Automatically adapts to be interactive or static based on href prop ## Image Preparation For best results, use product images with transparent backgrounds. On macOS, you can quickly remove backgrounds from images: 1. Right-click on the image file 2. Select "Quick Actions" > "Remove Background" 3. The system will automatically process the image and create a new version with a transparent background 4. Save the processed image and use it in your ProductSpotlightCard This works best with high-contrast product images and will help the card's gradient background show through more effectively. ## Accessibility The ProductSpotlightCard component follows accessibility best practices: - Proper ARIA attributes for screen readers - Keyboard navigation support - Semantic HTML structure - Focus management - High contrast ratios for text
